description: Add a rule to memory: 'Stake changes require explicit log entry with timestamp and reason. Auto-flag any deviation from baseline within 24 hours.'
reason: Stake has drifted twice now (2/14 and again by 2/15). Need accountability mechanism to prevent silent creep. This is a process issue, not a trading issue.

description: Reduce upper entry bound from 90% to 87%. Trade 75 (0.905 entry) is above the sweet spot and represents the kind of high-conviction, low-reward trade that fails at current stake levels.
reason: Memory log shows entries >0.85 have worse risk/reward at current stake levels. While 80-90% is the sweet spot, tightening to 80-87% would filter out marginal high-conviction entries.
